mapper.select: SELECT CART.`no` AS 'cart_no', P.no AS 'product_no', P.name AS 'product_name', PI.no AS 'image_no', CAT.no AS 'category_no', CAT.name AS 'category_name', CART.*, P.*, PI.*, CAT.* FROM `cart` CART INNER JOIN `product` P ON P.no = CART.product_no INNER JOIN `product_img` PI ON P.no = PI.product_no INNER JOIN `category` CAT ON CAT.no = P.category_no WHERE CART.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `cart` (no, user_id, product_no, amount, size, color) VALUES (NULL, #{user.id}, #{product.no}, #{amount}, #{size}, #{color})
mapper.update: UPDATE `cart` SET amount = amount + #{amount} WHERE no = #{cartNo}
